com.VTC.langlib.data

Interface DataHandler


  • public interface DataHandler
    DataHandler interface, defining the structure of all langlib-based data handling. All data, such as stacks or variables, should be stored and manipulated via this class.
    Author:
    vtcakavsmoace

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getFlagParameterCount(java.lang.String currentFlag)
      Get the number of parameters of the flag that occur after the flag is called.
      Flag getInstructionGivenFlag(java.lang.String flag)
      Given the passed parameters, modify the state of the language accordingly.
      void handleInput(java.util.List<java.lang.String> commandLineArguments)
      Handles input through command line arguments intended for the target program's use.
      boolean isCommandLineInvocationFlag(java.lang.String possibleFlag)
      Return whether or not a given string is a command line flag.

    • Method Detail

      • handleInput

        void handleInput(java.util.List<java.lang.String> commandLineArguments)
        Handles input through command line arguments intended for the target program's use. Precondition: all flags are handled by the Lang instance before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        commandLineArguments - The arguments intended to be added as data to the Lang instance by whatever means chosen by the implemented DataHandler.

      • isCommandLineInvocationFlag

        boolean isCommandLineInvocationFlag(java.lang.String possibleFlag)
        Return whether or not a given string is a command line flag. Precondition: The flag passed is not null.
        Parameters:
        possibleFlag - The string that possibly is a flag.
        Returns:
        isFlag Whether or not the string is indeed a flag.

      • getFlagParameterCount

        int getFlagParameterCount(java.lang.String currentFlag)
        Get the number of parameters of the flag that occur after the flag is called. Precondition: The flag passed is guaranteed to be valid and is not null.
        Parameters:
        currentFlag - The flag for which the parameter count is being retrieved
        Returns:
        parameterCount The number of parameters which the flag specifies.

      • getInstructionGivenFlag

        Flag getInstructionGivenFlag(java.lang.String flag)
        Given the passed parameters, modify the state of the language accordingly. Precondition: The flag passed is guaranteed to be valid and is not null.
        Parameters:
        flag - The flag whose instructions are attempted to being retrieved.
        Returns:
        flagInstructions The instructions intended to be enacted due to this flag's existence.
